EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER TOMORROW - Fix It With Felicia Webinar for Your Perform Software

STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Fix It With Felicia REMINDER: Tomorrow Reminder: Your Fix It With Felicia Webinar for Your Perform Software is Tomorrow! We'll be discussing the new Case Management. DATE: Every Second Thursday of the Month TIME: 11:00 AM ET l 10:00 AM CT l 9:00 AM MT l 8:00 AM PT PRESENTER: Felicia Donovan, TriTech Client Services AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the number shown on your screen after login
See you online! WEBINAR DETAILS JOIN LINK:
